hints.title: KL-Convergence for Mean-Field Euclidean Gas (CORRECTED)
hints.content:
3688: :label: thm-corrected-kl-convergence
3689: 
3690: If the kinetic dominance condition holds:
3691: 
3692: $$
3693: \sigma^2 \gamma \kappa_{\text{conf}} > C_0 \max\left(\frac{\lambda}{M_\infty}, \bar{\kappa}\right)
3694: 
3695: $$
3696: 
3697: then the mean-field Euclidean Gas converges exponentially to its QSD:
3698: 
3699: $$
3700: D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_t \| \rho_\infty) \le e^{-\alpha_{\text{net}} t} D_{\text{KL}}(\rho_0 \| \rho_\infty) + \frac{B_{\text{jump}}}{\alpha_{\text{net}}} (1 - e^{-\alpha_{\text{net}} t})
3701: 
3702: $$
3703: 
3704: where $\alpha_{\text{net}} = \alpha_{\text{kin}} - A_{\text{jump}} > 0$.
